alert.note: Alert for Interior York (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 25 at 3:07PM EST until January 26 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...HEAVY SNOW AND MIXED PRECIPITATION THIS EVENING THROUGH THURSDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations between 4 and 7 inches for a storm total of 4 to 8 inches and ice accumulations up to two tenths of an inch. * WHERE...In Maine, Interior York County. In New Hampshire, Belknap, Merrimack, Strafford, and Sullivan Counties. * WHEN...Until 10 AM EST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Periods of moderate and heavy snow will combine with low visibility to create dangerous driving conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday evening and Thursday morning commutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by going to newengland511.org
